metadata.name: ETHernal Series: catETHdral, 2022
metadata.description:
About ETHernal Series:  
The ETHernal Series is a visual representation of coined words where a select syllable is substituted with “ETH”.

About catETHdral:  
This is a work of art that is inspired by the architecture of Roman Catholic churches, specifically the dome and the structure's pillars. 

In this piece, I intended to project a 3-dimensional dome onto a 2-dimensional surface while maintaining the aesthetics of perspective, details, and precision.

The primary collector of this NFT is entitled to the signed, original work measuring 20” x 23". It is their property, whether or not they are ready to receive the physical work.
